title: 11/05/20 HOUR 1- Emmauel Acho
itunes:title: 11/05/20 HOUR 1- Emmauel Acho
description:
Emmanuel Acho tells Dan that his very first email address was Nigerian Nightmare after Christian Okoye. Emmanuel says that healing racial communication is his calling after his football career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
